mapper.sql: id, workshop_id, group_name, group_desc, depart_id, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, monitor, monitor2
mapper.select: select t.*, t1.name as workshopName, t1.depot_id as depotId, t2.name as depotName, t2.company_id as companyId, t3.name as companyName, (select org_code from sys_depart where id = t.id) as orgCode, (select count(user_id) from sys_user_depart where dep_id = t.id) as userCount, (select group_concat(line_id) from bu_mtr_depot_line where depot_id = t1.depot_id) as lineId from bu_mtr_workshop_group t left join bu_mtr_workshop t1 on t1.id = t.workshop_id left join bu_mtr_depot t2 on t2.id = t1.depot_id left join bu_mtr_company t3 on t3.id = t2.company_id where t.id = #{id}
